title: A Safe place
creator_credit: Robyn Cooney, Anne Whitehead and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: The prevention of child accidents in the home. Begins in the hospital, with the treatment of children in accidents, then broadens to a general look at the development of children in the first few years of growth, their capabilities, and perception of their environment, and potential for accident situations. Looks at ways of reducing risks to create a safe home environment.
